languages.text: All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все атаки псайкера, включая атакующие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, отравляют врага. Яд наносит {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} врага.

traits.locale_text: All Psyker's attacks, including the attacking psychic powers, now also poison enemies. This poison deals <u>psy rating</u> damage every turn.
All the psyker's attacks, including damaging psychic powers, now poison enemies. This poison deals <u>psy rating</u> damage every turn.
All the psyker's attacks, including damaging psychic powers, now poison enemies. This poison deals <u>psy rating</u> damage every turn.

All the psyker's attacks, including damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}{/g} damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

languages.text: 灵能者的所有攻击，包括伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，都会使敌人中毒。中毒的敌人会在每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到{uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 灵能者的所有攻击，包括伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，都会使敌人中毒。中毒的敌人会在每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到{uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。
灵能者的所有攻击，包括伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}，都会使敌人中毒。中毒的敌人每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都会受到伤害，伤害等同于{uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}{/g}。

languages.text: Ahora todos los ataques del psíquico, incluyendo los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} ofensivos, envenenan a los enemigos. Este veneno inflige {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo.
languages.original_text: All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ahora todos los ataques del psíquico, incluyendo los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} ofensivos, envenenan a los enemigos. Este veneno inflige {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>factor psíquico</u>{/g} de daño cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

Ahora todos los ataques del psíquico, incluyendo los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} ofensivos, envenenan a los enemigos. Este veneno inflige {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}{/g} de daño cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を含む異能者の全攻撃が敵に毒を与える。この毒は敵の各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を{uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}付与する。
languages.original_text: All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を含む異能者の全攻撃が敵に毒を与える。この毒は敵の各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を{uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}付与する。
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}にダメージを与えるものを含む異能者のあらゆる攻撃で、敵を毒で侵す。この毒は毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}{/g} にダメージを与える。

languages.text: Все атаки псайкера, включая атакующие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, отравляют врага. Яд наносит {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} врага.
languages.original_text: All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все атаки псайкера, включая {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g}, которые наносят урон, накладывают на врага эффект "яд". Яд наносит {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>пси-рейтинг</u>{/g} урона каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

Все атаки псайкера, включая {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g}, которые наносят урон, накладывают на врага эффект "яд". Яд наносит {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>пси-рейтинг</u>{/g} урона каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

Все атаки псайкера, включая {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g}, которые наносят урон, накладывают на врага эффект "яд". Яд наносит {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}{/g} урона каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

languages.text: Alle Angriffe des Psionikers einschließlich angreifender {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischer Kräfte{/g} vergiften Feinde nun. Dieses Gift fügt zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Feindes {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle Angriffe des Psionikers, einschließlich schädigender {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischer Kräfte{/g} vergiften Feinde nun. Dieses Gift fügt {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>Psi-Wert</u>{/g} Schaden zu, und zwar bei jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

Alle Angriffe des Psionikers, einschließlich schädigender {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischer Kräfte{/g} vergiften Feinde nun. Dieses Gift fügt {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}{/g} Schaden zu, und zwar bei jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

languages.text: Toutes les attaques du psyker, y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} offensifs, empoisonnent désormais les ennemis. Ce poison inflige {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'ennemi.
languages.original_text: All the psyker's attacks, including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} at the start of each of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les attaques du psyker, y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qui infligent des dégâts, empoisonnent désormais les ennemis. Ce poison inflige {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>indice psy</u>{/g} points de dégâts à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

Toutes les attaques du psyker, y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qui infligent des dégâts, empoisonnent désormais les ennemis. Ce poison inflige {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a}{/g} points de dégâts à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: Saldırı amaçlı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} de dâhil ruhsezerin tüm saldırıları, artık düşmanları zehirler. Bu zehir, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} her başladığında {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasar{/g} verir.
